sentence.Network_en: Segmental construction contributes toward aesthetically pleasing structures in many different sites.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于许多不同的现场条件,分段施工都能提供美观,颇有魄力的桥型结构.

sentence.Network_en: All isolation techniques may be aesthetically unacceptable or even dirty.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有的隔离方法都有可能在美观方面使人难以接受,或甚至是肮脏的.

sentence.Network_en: It aims to identify the characteristic value of aesthetically satisfying objects.
sentence.Network_cn: 它的目的在于鉴别审美快感的物体所特有的价值.

entry.tran: 美的；艺术的；美感的；审美的
entry.def: Aesthetic is used to talk about beauty or art, and people's appreciation of beautiful things.

example.ex: ...products chosen for their aesthetic appeal as well as their durability and quality.
example.tran: 因其外形美观且经久耐用、质量上乘而被选定的产品
